Articles.Content:
![5xtJkBU.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/5xtJkBU.jpg)

**Accurate replicas of every major Soivet Cold-War Era craft, including 13 fighters, 2 bombers, 1 attacker, 1 transport, and 3 trainers.**

**Flaps are on action Group "4" for most planes - check before you fly.**

http://www.mediafire.com/download/iikus7db9eibk7q/Soviet+Plane+Pack.rar

**By Zekes, War Eagle 1, SpaceXray, and Mad Rocket Scientist.**

I managed mach 3.3 just before turning engines off to stop overheat in the MiG-25, gets my marks. Tried to get home and managed mach 3.3 again, but I was too busy monitoring the temp gauges to make sure I wasn't running out of memory due to them.

EDIT: Managed just about mach 3.4 before having to cut very fast! Will try on non-overheat game.
